Quickstrike:





Quickstrike squinted his crimson eyes as he listened in onto Battera. 
"That's what ah wanted t' hear." He and his comrades were somewhat safe 
hearing she wasn't with Hell Beast. He turned to Dark Mouse. "Come on," he 
said, gesturing to her. He nudged Stingtra and walked towards the mouth of 
the cave.
